author: Elysse Morgan
title: OECD endorses economic hibernation plan but warns recovery after coronavirus will be slow
description: OECD secretary general Angel Gurría says global growth will be reduced by about 5 per cent and economic recovery from coronavirus will take time.
content:
Posted 
April 01, 2020 16:53:09
Australia's proposal for the global economy to go into hibernation amid the coronavirus pandemic has been endorsed by the Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD), but it has warned countries will not "re-… [+5453 chars]
